description: Jarrett has lost his boyfriend and possibly even his mind! While trying to cope with the recent death of his beloved Ashton, Jarrett begins to hear a mysterious voice beckon to him, whispering the words 'If you fuck him...he will cum'. What follows is a story of love and sex as Jarrett tries to find the love of his life, while Ashton's friends try to stop him from going completely insane
title: Eon FIlms: Field of Creams
